headline.main: Officials: Baltimore Officer Indicted for Excessive Force
headline.print_headline: Officials: Baltimore Officer Indicted for Excessive Force

docs.snippet: A Baltimore police officer who fatally shot a knife-wielding man at a child's birthday party last year has been indicted on charges of assault and misconduct in office for using excessive force in a separate incident....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Baltimore police officer who fatally shot a knife-wielding man at a child's birthday party last year has been indicted on charges of assault and misconduct in office for using excessive force in a separate incident.

headline.main: Trump Speaks With Taiwan’s Leader, an Affront to China
headline.print_headline: Trump Muddies China Relations With Taiwan Call

docs.snippet: The president-elect spoke by phone with the president of Taiwan in the first such contact since the United States severed diplomatic relations with the island....
docs.abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump speaks by phone with Taiwanese Pres Tsai Ing-wen, becoming first president or president-elect to speak with any Taiwanese leader since at least 1979, when United States broke ties with Taiwan in recognition of People's Republic of China; Trump's motives in breaking nearly four decades of diplomatic practice remain unclear.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Jane Perlez from Beijing, Michael Forsythe from Hong Kong, and Eric Lipton and Jennifer Steinhauer from Washington.
byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and DAVID E. SANGER

docs.lead_paragraph: The president-elect spoke by phone with the president of Taiwan in the first such contact since the United States severed diplomatic relations with the island.

headline.main: 66-Year-Old Man Was Driver in Iowa Wal-Mart Store Crash
headline.print_headline: 66-Year-Old Man Was Driver in Iowa Wal-Mart Store Crash

docs.snippet: A 66-year-old southern Iowa man was identified as the driver of a pickup truck that crashed into a southeast Iowa Wal-Mart, killing three and injuring himself and another man in what officials believe was an accident....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 66-year-old southern Iowa man was identified as the driver of a pickup truck that crashed into a southeast Iowa Wal-Mart, killing three and injuring himself and another man in what officials believe was an accident.

headline.main: China Hopes Trump Call With Taiwan Leader Won't Damage Ties
headline.print_headline: China Hopes Trump Call With Taiwan Leader Won't Damage Ties

docs.snippet: China's foreign minister said Saturday he hopes Beijing's relations with the U.S. would not be "interfered with or damaged" after President-elect Donald Trump broke with decadeslong diplomatic tradition and spoke directly with Taiwan's leader....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's foreign minister said Saturday he hopes Beijing's relations with the U.S. would not be "interfered with or damaged" after President-elect Donald Trump broke with decadeslong diplomatic tradition and spoke directly with Taiwan's leader.
